description: Any local will tell you that no winter in the mountains is complete without a comfortable fleece you can where everywhere—the Southpass™ Fleece Hoody is just that. High pile Sherpa fleece gives it that classic style that lasts for ages, all while giving it that soft warmth you need to keep cruising from the first squall of snow to the last stretch of slush.
name: Mountain Hardwear Southpass Hoody - Mens
